document.full_text: robbie robertson has just released his first album in 13 years, but the former guitarist/songwriter for the band was far from a gentleman at leisure in that time.
document.title: a minute with: robbie robertson about his new album
lines_and_colors: robbie robertson has just released his first album in 13 years, but the former guitarist/songwriter for the band was far from a gentleman at leisure in that time.
